targets.query: SELECT countDistinct(playerId) AS dau, toDate(ts) AS day FROM game_event GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
SELECT countDistinct(playerId) AS mau, toStartOfMonth(ts) AS month FROM game_event GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT sum(rake) AS rake, toStartOfHour(ts) AS ts FROM wallet_commit GROUP BY ts ORDER BY ts
SELECT v.stake, v.vpip, p.pfr FROM stake_vpip v JOIN stake_pfr p USING (stake) ORDER BY v.stake
